SimpleStock - Class in stocks
The stocks.Stock class represents basic information about a stock in a portfolio, including symbol, number of shares, and historical data.

SimpleStockController - Class in mvc.controller
Controller class that processes user input this SimpleStockController is outdated because it doesn't support the new functions, but it is still used to handle any unchanged functionality and the inputs that are used for that.

Controller constructor.

Controller will pass its parameters to the menu to help cut down on long switch statements in the controllerGo method.

stock - Variable in class mvc.view.MockTestsForOutputs
 
Stock - Interface in stocks
The stock interface represents stock objects that are able to track their own number of shares, historical data and identity (ticker).
StockController - Interface in mvc.controller
The StockController interface represents the handling of inputs to the stock program via the controller the StockController interface has two implementations that coexist, the Simple and Advanced controllers, the advanced controller class adds support for the new inputs while delegating any existing inputs to the simple controller.
StockData - Interface in stocks
The stocks.StockData interface represents different forms of stocks.Stock data and operations for that data.
StockDataSource - Interface in stocks
The stocks.StockDataSource interface represents different types of data sources for reporting stock information and methods to retrieve the data.
stockInstructionsMenu() - Method in class mvc.view.SimpleTextStockView
 
stockInstructionsMenu() - Method in interface mvc.view.TextStockView
The stockInstructionsMenu method displays the instructions for the stock menu.
stockListToString(List<BetterStock>) - Method in class portfolios.AdvancedStockPortfolio
The stockListToString method converts a list of Stock objects to a string list.
stockListToString(List<Stock>) - Method in class portfolios.SimpleStockPortfolio
The stockListToString method converts a list of Stock objects to a string list.
StockManager - Interface in mvc.model
The mvc.model.StockManager interface represents operations on stocks and is the interface that houses the methods for the model of this application.
StockPortfolio - Interface in portfolios
The portfolios.StockPortfolio interface represent operations on a portfolio of stocks, allowing for the addition and removal of stocks as well as the calculation of total value on a given day.
StockProgram - Class in mvc
Method to run the Stock program.
StockProgram() - Constructor for class mvc.StockProgram
